title: Vegan S'more Sundae
directions: Simply layer all ingredients into your favorite mug or dish and enjoy!
ingredients: 1/2 cup So Delicious Dairy Free Dark Chocolate Truffle Cashew Milk Frozen Dessert
Gluten-free crackers (such as Mary's Gone Crackers)
Gluten-free vegan graham crackers (like MiNi's Graham Bites)
